properties.description: Open from 03/10/2022. We have no exclusions We are offering hot drinks, soup and snacks. We have one main large warm space and also other rooms if we have an influx of people. In these rooms we provide books for Adults/Children and we have paper pens and internet access for anyone wishing to use
